welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Balagtas, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city, known for its rich history, delicious local cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Balagtas has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving domestic flights to and from Manila.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the newest terminal and serves international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage and speed.
